recipe.title: Summer Fruit with Praline Fondue
ingredients: Assorted fresh fruit (such as grapes, berries, cherries, and plum and peach wedges) Melt in medium nonstick skillet over medium heat:
6 tablespoons unsalted butter Increase heat to medium-high and add:
2 tablespoons water Stir sugar and water 1 minute (mixture will bubble vigorously), then stir in:
instructions: Transfer butterscotch to bowl. Serve with crème fraîche, nuts, and fruit.
